Convert Chat GPT to Google Doc - conversations into well-formatted Google Documents with a single click using the "Convert ChatGPT to Google Doc" extension. This powerful tool ensures that all rich text formats, including bold, italic, lists, headings, images, and tables are seamlessly preserved, enhancing your documentation workflow without the hassle of manual reformatting. Its easy to Convert GPT to Google Doc

You can use this extension to export chatgpt response,messages to Microsoft word, notion, gmail and slack too
